title: Bucket, we'll do it live!
description: Have 10 buckets of dechlorinated water in your inventory. For some reason.

dialogue.text: Hellooooo adventurer! You know what I find truly fascinating? Water! There's so much of it! I want all of it! Get me water! Lots of water!

options.text: I have the 10 buckets ... that took awhile!

dialogue.text: Ahhh, you're the best, adventurer! Have I ever told you that? You're the best! I give you this shiny liquid award!
